equation:
\begin{equation}
   \Tr \left[ \mu^\alpha \> e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right]
   =
   \mu^\alpha \, \Tr \left[ (-1)^F \, e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right] ,
\

\begin{equation}
   \frac{\partial }{ \partial \mu^\alpha} \,
   \Tr \left[ e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right]
   =
   \Tr \left[ (-1)^F \right.
       \frac{\partial }{ \partial \mu^\alpha} \left. e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots
   \right] .
\

\begin{equation}
   \Tr \left[ \mu^\alpha \> e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right]
   =
   \mu^\alpha \, \Tr \left[ (-1)^F \, e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right] ,
\

\begin{equation}
   \frac{\partial }{ \partial \mu^\alpha} \,
   \Tr \left[ e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots \right]
   =
   \Tr \left[ (-1)^F \right.
       \frac{\partial }{ \partial \mu^\alpha} \left. e^{\beta u_\nu P^\nu} \cdots
   \right] .
